articles.description:
Check out @PolynomialFi structured product vaults on @optimismPBC generating yield by selling call/put options.
Its built on top of @lyrafinance & @synthetix_io so you need to deposit $sETH or $sUSD to join a vault.
Still early days but might be worth it in a few months 😜
